snippet: The lawsuit says the painting, “Colorful Life,” was sold without permission when a Jewish family fled the Netherlands....

headline.main: Factbox: Findings of Senate Tax Probe a Focus of IRS Search at Caterpillar
headline.print_headline: Factbox: Findings of Senate Tax Probe a Focus of IRS Search at Caterpillar

lead_paragraph: The lawsuit says the painting, “Colorful Life,” was sold without permission when a Jewish family fled the Netherlands.
